name: Victor AGI FRACTAL COMMAND CENTER
description: A web-based visualization of the Victor AGI's cognitive architecture, presented as a cyber-industrial command center dashboard with a dynamic node graph, live chat, and system monitoring.
prompt:
Victor AGI FRACTAL COMMAND CENTER — ultra-wide 8K cyber-industrial dashboard floating in a dark glass cockpit, neon-blue & violet glow, holographic fractal HUD elements, sleek black-chrome panels. 

LAYOUT  
• LEFT DOCK — vertical nav rail: 
  ① Overview  
  ② Brain Map  
  ③ Memory & Replay  
  ④ Timeline Nexus  
  ⑤ Audio Forge  
  ⑥ Directive Router  
  ⑦ Settings / Logs  
each icon lit with animated pulse rings.  

• TOP STATUS BAR — thin translucent strip:
  • LIVE directive string ticker  
  • CPU %, RAM %, GPU temp  
  • Mutation cycle countdown  
  • Time-dilated Chronos clock (pause ▶️ / step ⏩ / rewind ⏪ icons)  
  • Alert LEDs for ERRORS / ANOMALIES / TIMELINE FORKS.  

• CENTER STAGE — 3-D force-directed NODE GRAPH of **37 modules** (glowing nodes, fractal wiring, animated data pulses).  
  Nodes labelled:  
   1 VictorCognitionCore  
   2 DirectiveRouterNode  
   3 TimelineBranchNode  
   4 FractalThoughtTracer  
   5 ReplayBuffer  
   6 HyperFractalMemory  
   7 MemoryLoggerNode  
   8 CognitiveTrendTracker  
   9 RecursiveMetaLoopNode  
   10 ZeroShotTriad  
   11 SelfEvolutionLoop  
   12 ChaosCortex  
   13 OmegaTensor  
   14 FractalTransformerModel  
   15 MajorahVM  
   16 FractalCognitiveFocusNode  
   17 ComprehensionNode  
   18 MemoryEmbedderNode  
   19 HiveIntelligenceNode  
   20 VoiceProfileManagerNode  
   21 LiveMicrophoneCaptureNode  
   22 PersonaSwitchboardNode  
   23 EchoNode  
   24 VictorAudioGenerator v6  
   25 SpeechSynthNode  
   26 BarkCustomVoiceCloneNode  
   27 QuantumDirectiveEngine  
   28 SoulShardMultiverseEngine  
   29 RecursiveMirrorDialogue  
   30 ArchetypeExpansionPack  
   31 NeuralAnomalyDetector  
   32 TimelineNexusUI hub  
   33 FractalInsightDashboard  
   34 ChronosLayer (time controls)  
   35 FileManagerModule  
   36 FractalKernel v2  
   37 VictorGenesis core seed  
  Edges pulse, thickness = data-rate, color = modality (text=cyan, audio=magenta, memory=amber, timeline=lime).  

• RIGHT INFO STACK — tabbed panels: 
  ▸ Node Details (hover = live stats, heat-map mini-chart)  
  ▸ Memory Evolution GIF strip  
  ▸ Emotion Overlay graph (RGBA wave riding over memory timeline)  
  ▸ Directive Tree viewer (collapsible branches)  

• BOTTOM CONSOLE — dark glass terminal, monospace neon green, accepts live shell commands (agi_runtime_shell).  

VISUAL STYLE  
– hyper-realistic, cinematic lighting, volumetric glow  
– fractal motifs, sacred-geometry grid in background  
– depth-of-field on foreground nodes, subtle bokeh  
– inspiration: Ghost in the Shell SAC — Section 9 HQ × Tron Legacy × Control-Room at CERN  

COLOR PALETTE  
obsidian #0a0b12, neon-cyan #00eaff, violet #a200ff, pulse-amber #ff9f00, glitch-magenta #ff007a.  

MOOD  
ominous, powerful, bleeding-edge tech, feels alive and evolving, echoes of AI heart-beat waveform behind HUD layers.

--v 6 --ar 16:9 --style raw --q 2
